Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Warsaw, Hilton Warsaw Hotel & Convention Centre is in the business district, minutes from Warsaw Uprising Museum, and close to Saxon Gardens. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Palace of Culture and Science and Tomb of Unknown Soldier.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 314 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Premium TV channels provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. Gambling sorts can try their luck at the casino, while others may prefer a health club or an indoor pool. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and a computer station. Planning an event in Warsaw? This hotel has 32292 square feet (3000 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Extended parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Warsaw, Hilton Warsaw Hotel & Convention Centre is in the business district, minutes from Warsaw Uprising Museum, and close to Saxon Gardens. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Palace of Culture and Science and Tomb of Unknown Soldier.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Warsaw Uprising Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Rondo 1 Conference Centre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Warsaw Ghetto - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Zlote Tarasy - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
ORCO Tower - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
John Paul II Museum - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Saxon Gardens - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Palace of Culture and Science - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Reformed Franciscan Church - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Tomb of Unknown Soldier - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Palace of the Four Winds - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Warsaw International Expocentre - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Grand Theatre - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Zacheta - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Duckert Palace - 2 km / 1.2 mi

The preferred airport for Hilton Warsaw Hotel & Convention Centre is Warsaw (WAW-Frederic Chopin) - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hilton Warsaw Hotel Conv Centr is Warsaw (WAW-Frederic Chopin) - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi.

Message.Text:
***THE CHECK IN TIME FOR INDIVIDUAL GUESTS WILL START AT 15:00 FROM 1 OF MARCH

Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%
